price: Na wao wana kisasi juu yangu, kwa hivyo naogopa wasije kuniuwa.
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ عَلَيَّ ذَنۢبٞ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقۡتُلُونِ
footnotes: Na watu hawa wana kisasi juu yangu. Kwani mimi nilimuuwa mtu katika wao. Basi nina khofu watakuja niuwa kwa kisasi kabla sijatimiza kazi yangu. Hayo yananizidisha khofu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walahum ʿalayya dhanbun fa-akhāfu an yaqtulūni
